snippet.title: Poll: Most Americans oppose using force against Russia
snippet.description:
* (CNN) - A majority of Americans say Ukraine is important to U.S. national interests, but when it comes to the crisis in the eastern European country, only a small sliver of the public says Washington should consider military actions against Russia...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/15/poll-most-americans-oppose-using-force-against-russia/

snippet.title: Was anti-Semitism an idea exported from Europe?
snippet.description:
* Watch "Fareed Zakaria GPS," Sundays at 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. ET on CNN Fareed speaks with Simon Schama, professor of history at Columbia University and author of The Story of the Jews, about the roots of anti-Semitism. And what about Arab anti-Semitism –...
http://globalpublicsquare.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/22/was-anti-semitism-an-idea-exported-from-europe/

snippet.title: Poll: Key Senate battle all tied up
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Cliven Bundy: Another conservative folk hero exposes racial nerve
snippet.description:
* Nevada rancher Cliven Bundy's remarks about whether "the Negro" fared better under slavery represents the latest in a series of incendiary racial comments from a new crop of folk heroes embraced in some conservative circles.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/politics/bundy-and-race/index.html

snippet.title: The perils of Rick Perry
snippet.description:
* Politicians struggle with reinvention after failure, and during the Internet era, everything lives forever in the digital universe. Some things simply cannot be undone, no matter how hard we might try.
